subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The project will contribute to the improvement of consumer protection of animal food products. It will support the harmonization and modernization of the national livestock databases to improve the traceability and safety of livestock products. A value chain for lamb meat will be developed according to the EU principles of quality and food safety – “from farm to fork”. The project will work with voluntary formed farmers associations and will introduce to breeders the concept of environmental control of pastures.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Albanian Livestock
